name: Stories Told in 1001 Nights
text: Put target resonator on top of its owner's main deck. If your J/Ruler is "Liberator of Wind" or "Scheherazade, the Teller of 1001 Stories", remove it from the game, then search its controller's main deck, graveyard and hand for all cards with the same name and remove them from the game instead. Then that player shuffles his or her main deck.
